cunning.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who is cunning is clever and good at deceiving people in order to get what they want
cunning.translation[0].definitions[1].de: behaviour or actions that are cunning are clever but dishonest and unfair, and are used to get what you want
cunning.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a cunning object or piece of equipment is clever and unusual
cunning.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: a cunning little device for keeping out draughts
cunning.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the ability to achieve what you want by deceiving people in a clever way
cunning.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: She would use low cunning  (=unpleasant dishonest methods) to win people’s sympathy.
